description:
#1. I've never seen Cairo Dock falter at anything, I'however ve and heard reports of a vey child way of tgatbeen seen a lottoldFor me, it just work, but I have never had a Fedora Operating System instealled on any of my machines.Im surprised that this dock gave anyone any problems. It's a veryelaborate docker app, though, so I, as far as docker apps go, ths one is probably the most compled by a factor of ten out of the ones I've tried. I can only think of four dockers thqait didn't work for you. While it is true that Cairo Dock seems to be much more intricate than most docks, I have never personally seen it falter, whatsoever. I have never been a Fedora user, though, and I HAVE noticed more than a few complaints about Gnome and Various Apps meant to work in similar environments 

#2. I installed and tested four popular docks in an attempt to determine which was superior: Plank (originally from the Cinnamon desktop, which I like a lot but it'so buggy that anytime I've installed it in any Uuntu Flavor, it has always had the same major screen flipping 180 degress, then correcting iteCinnamonin anything but Linx Minut, which is it
summary: Two thoughts on this docker app.

description: Would like to see a stable version of this for Kubuntu.
summary: Doesn't work for me in Kubuntu

description:
Amazing launcher with great customization. Unfortunately with very few documentation and non existent help or instructions. Still works flawlessly with 19.10 
In the positive: It does work (and very well)
Looks nice, but first attempt to use it on ubuntu 19.04, it caused 100% cpu, and the system froze.
I wanna add only some programs to the dock without walking around in a complex configuration menu! Learn from Mac Osx user friendly features.

xubuntu 18.04. It appeared that the dock installed with no problem. When I started it for the first time I did get the prompt to use OpenGL or not. Next came this message:

No plug-ins were found.
Plug-ins provide most of the functionalites (animations, applets, views, etc.)
See http://glx-dock.org for more information.
There is almost not meaning in running the dock without them and it's probably due to a problem with the installation of these plug-ins.
But if you really want to use the dock without these plug-ins, you can launch the dock with the'-f' option to no longer have this message.
--------------------
Obviously, there are several key plug-ins that did not come across with this install. I have installed the dock on LinuxMint xfce with no problems so I'm sure it's just a minor repository issue.
Don't use this. It's outdated, unoptimised, annoying and installs the entire GNOME DE on installation.

loved it.
 Hope to see more productive things in future.
summary: Fantastic way to organise apps on a new taksbar: Dock

description: Overly complicated, very poor initial setup and inline documentation. It's probably not as buggy as it seems if you give it a couple hours' effort. But I'm not interested in that.
125% ratio 2256x1504 3:2 13.5 inch display does NOT wotrk. I have to delete it and find another dock, sorry, 100% ratio is working but too small.
there is no resoan
can't easily incorporate my Trash bin into it (Peppermint 11 PCSpecNet Edition) unlike I could previously when used Docky.
summary: can look nice but issues prevent it from being practical

description: Completely useless, couldnt get to work. Video tutorials didnt help, overall garbage
Kinda buggy visually as it allows for overlapping docks if you're not careful. Also, the configuration UI isn't too intuitive :/
summary: Not really worth it unless a dock is an absolute must-have

description: diese Paketverwaltung ist der größte ......
No responde bien a la posicion de la pantalla cuando le ponia que sea inferior que quedaba arriba, en fin la saque.

Hola, no se ajusta bien a los bordes, pero en gnome, en kde no tiene problemas.
La puntuacion es por el comportamiento general, no por un problema puntual.

Cuando arrastro un nuevo lanzador al dock, éste no tiene el icono de la aplicación, queda con un signo de interrogación. Al hacer cambio de tema, se congelaba y no dejaba hacer nada mas. Cuando logré cambiar un tema, este no se mostraba como en la imagen previa, era diferente.
summary: Error en iconos de nuevos lanzadores

description:
Es el dock que más me gusta, pero en Ubuntu 21.10 con gnome 40 sólo se me muestra en la parte superior. Por más que intento, no logro colocarlo en la parte inferior.
Buscando solución...

Le problème principal c'est quand on veut le désinstaller.

La distribution propose une installation (qui fonctionne bien) et quand on veut désinstaller c'est impossible (pas de paquets!)

C'est un souci après pour trouver la solution à la désinstallation, les commandes usuelles ne fonctionnent pas (il n'y a pas de paquet à purger)
summary: intéressant mais pas autant que Plank

description: completement nul !! pourquoi avoir abandonner docky qui etait meilleurs
Docky est où ?????????
Visiblement sur mon laptop Hp probook 450 g2 il fonctionne moyen.
summary: Semble bien mais pas chez moi

description: docky exite toujours car je l'ai installer
docky n'est plus sur la version xubuntu 19.04 mais a la place on touve plank que je trouve moins plaisant
pas mal mais docky est mieux j'ai pu le télécharger sur https://pkgs.org/download/docky

Мне очень понравилось количество настроек и возможностей модификации, но банальное расположение панели на дисплее не работает, как положено. При выборе варианта снизу, панель немного смещается от верхней своей позиции, но не вниз дисплея. Также к правому краю не ставится, прыгает в левую часть дисплея. Все манипуляции проходили под Wayland. Спасибо за труды, но у меня работает с проблемами, несовместимыми для комфортного пользования.
У меня не завелась анимация-на линукс минт работала а на убунту не захотела.Пока неразобрался почему так.

Для любителей ( UNITY ) в убунту 20.04 с ЦЕНТРА ПРИЛОЖЕНИЙ установка кастрированная. Короче говоря для нормальной работы если Вы установили с центра приложений Вам нужно зайти в Synaptic > Специальные фильтры > Отсутствуют рекомендованные и выбрать cairo-dock. Будут установлено 50 дополнительных пакетов. Ну и еще один глюк исправить АППЛЕТ, ЯРЛЫКИ. В терминале ввести; 
( sudo apt-get install cairo-dock-gnome-integration-plug-in )
( cairo-dock restart ) 
ссылка https://forum.ubuntu.ru/index.php?topic=301195.msg2359643#msg2359643
summary: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS ( UNITY ). Работает без глюков
